mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents) values(#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardContents})
mapper.select: select id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardHits, date_format(createdAt, "%Y-%m-%d") as createdAt from board_table order by id desc
mapper.update: update board_table set boardHits = boardHits+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents, boardHits, date_format(createdAt, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as createAt from board_table where id = #{id}
